column1: These results suggest that hormonal replacement therapy can be safely prescribed if the following criteria are satisfied : 1 ) preliminary evaluation of patients from a clinical , metabolic , cytologic , and mammographic perspective ; 2 ) cyclic treatment schedule , with a progestative phase of 10 days ; and 3 ) periodic complete follow - up , with accurate thermographic evaluation of the breast target tissues .
